author: max
name: Holiday
install_msg:
Thanks for installing. Please note this only display official public holidays.
<https://docs.maxapp.tv/docs/holiday.html> for documentations.
description: Display public holidays for countries worldwide, with support for setting a default country and listing available countries.
short: Display public holidays for countries worldwide, with support for setting a default country and listing available countries.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
